verses.name: Hosea 2:21
verses.text: And it shall come to pass in that day, I will hear, saith the Lord, I will hear the heavens, and they shall hear the earth;

verses.name: Hosea 2:22
verses.text: And the earth shall hear the corn, and the wine, and the oil; and they shall hear Jezreel.

verses.name: Hosea 2:23
verses.text: And I will sow her unto me in the earth; and I will have mercy upon her that had not obtained mercy; and I will say to them which were not my people, Thou art my people; and they shall say, Thou art my God.
